description: Mission: Scholarship will support an incoming Freshman who is a graduate from Purcell High School. Eligibility Requirements Graduate from Purcell High School Letter of recommendation from the Purcell High School principal Incoming freshman to UCO Plan to pursue a degree within the College of Mathematics and Science This scholarship is available to apply for through the Incoming Student Application.
